EmailTemplate.name: BIR
EmailTemplate.subject: Bid Information Request
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Bid_Information_Request__c.Assigned_To__c},
Bid Information Request {!Bid_Information_Request__c.Link} has been assigned to you.
Please reply by {!Bid_Information_Request__c.Response_Date__c} and provide the information for the question:
{!Bid_Information_Request__c.Question__c}
